title: RCX Trace Event (v2) - Observability and Execution Extension
description: Extends v1 with observability and execution events. v2 events are opt-in and do not affect v1 replay gates. Observability types (debug-only): reduction.stall, reduction.applied, reduction.normal. Execution types (RCX_EXECUTION_V0=1): execution.stall, execution.fix, execution.fixed.

type.description: Event type. Observability: reduction.stall, reduction.applied, reduction.normal. Execution: execution.stall, execution.fix, execution.fixed.

t.description: Tag (e.g. rule_id for reduction.applied or execution.fix)

mu.description: Optional payload. Observability: {reason, rule_id, before_depth, after_depth}. Execution: {pattern_id, value_hash, rule_id, before_hash, after_hash}.

meta.description: Optional metadata: object only (canonicalized with deep sort).
